Keren! Penampakan Terkini Rumah untuk Tukang Cukur Asgar
02 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Pool
 Garut - Pada 19 Januari 2019 Presiden Jokowi meresmikan dimulainya proyek rumah untuk para tukang cukur rambut di Garut. Nah, inilah hasilnya sekarang.



Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat (PUPR) melalui Direktorat Jenderal Penyediaan Perumahan akan memberikan dukungan prasarana, sarana dan utilitas (PSU) untuk mendukung perumahan berbasis komunitas seperti perumahan khusus tukang cukur di Garut, Jawa Barat. Saat ini sedikitnya telah terbangun sekitar 100 unit rumah bersubsidi untuk para tukang cukur yang tergabung dalam Persaudaraan Pangkas Rambut Garut (PPRG) di Desa Sukamukti, Banyuresmi, Garut. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Sebagai informasi, pada tanggal 19 Januari 2019 lalu Presiden Joko Widodo melakukan peletakan batu pertama untuk pembangunan rumah bersubsidi bagi para tukang cukur di Kabupaten Garut. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Para tukang cukur yang tergabung dalam Persaudaraan Pangkas Rambut Garut (PPRG) tersebut dapat memiliki rumah tipe 30/ 60 dengan angsuran Kredit Pemilikan Rumah Fasilitas Likuiditas Pembiayaan Perumahan (KPR FLPP) hanya Rp 800.000 per bulan. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Angsuran yang harus dibayarkan oleh anggota PPRG sekitar Rp 800 ribu hingga Rp 1 juta per bulan. Adapun harga jual rumah sesuai harga jual rumah bersubsidi yang telah ditetapkan pemerintah. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Pembangunan rumah PPRG di Garut ini rencana akan dibangun sebanyak 500 unit. Untuk tahap pertama akan dibangun 150 unit. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Pembangunan rumah untuk para tukang cukur tersebut merupakan bagian dari Program Satu Juta Rumah yang menjadi salah satu program penyediaan perumahan di Indonesia. Pemerintah ke depan juga akan  menyiapkan bantuan perumahan di provinsi dengan menggandeng komunitas – komunitas masyarakat. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Sementara itu, perwakilan PT Mitra Budiman selaku Pengembang Perumahan PPRG, Agus Rusyanto menyatakan, saat ini sudah terbangun sebanyak 99 unit dan sudah terealisasi akad kredit sekitar 76 unit. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.
 



Untuk mewujudkan rumah yang nyaman bagi para penghuninya, pihak pengembang ke depan akan mendukung pembangunan fasilitas umum (Fasum) dan fasilitas sosial (Fasos) serta tempat pelatihan tukang cukur, balai pertemuan warga, museum tukang cukur, dan masjid. Pool/Ditjen Penyediaan Perumahan Kementerian PUPR.

Cool! Latest House Appearance for Asgar Barbers
02 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Pool
Garut - On January 19, 2019 President Jokowi inaugurated the start of a house project for hairdressers in Garut. Well, this is the result now.



The Ministry of Public Works and Public Housing (PUPR) through the Directorate General of Housing Provision will provide infrastructure, facilities and utilities (PSU) support to support community-based housing such as barbers' special housing in Garut, West Java. At present, at least 100 subsidized housing units have been built for barbers who are members of the Garut Barbering Fraternity (PPRG) in Sukamukti Village, Banyuresmi, Garut. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




For information, on January 19, 2019, President Joko Widodo laid the first stone for the construction of subsidized houses for barbers in Garut Regency. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




The barbers who are members of the Garut Barbering Fraternity (PPRG) can have a house of type 30/60 with installments for Housing Financing Liquidity Liquidity Facility (KPR FLPP) for only Rp. 800,000 per month. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




Installments that must be paid by PPRG members are around Rp. 800 thousand to Rp. 1 million per month. The selling price of the house is in accordance with the selling price of subsidized housing set by the government. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




The construction of PPRG houses in Garut is planned to be built as many as 500 units. For the first phase 150 units will be built. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




The construction of houses for barbers is part of the One Million Houses Program which is one of the housing supply programs in Indonesia. The government in the future will also prepare housing assistance in the province by cooperating with community communities. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




Meanwhile, the representative of PT Mitra Budiman as the PPRG Housing Developer, Agus Rusyanto stated, currently 99 units have been built and 76 credit units have been realized. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.




To create a comfortable home for its residents, the developer will support the construction of public facilities (Fasum) and social facilities (Fasos) as well as a barber training center, community meeting hall, barber museum, and mosque. Pool / DG of Housing Provision of the Ministry of Public Works and Housing.
